title: 10th Anniversary Skins
body: I got the summoner icon yesterday, so I'm guessing the skin will come after Riot have given everyone the summoner icon?

replies.body:
I got the skin without getting a notification. I got a pop up about the icon though.

I checked Kayle page and Riot Kayle was just there like a day after i got the icon.
yeah, but I have Riot kayle already, so that's what I was wondering
